event.title: represents the 0.616 percentage of the Oaxacan state As of 2005

data.event: The municipality has 588.15 km2 of land which it represents the 0.616 percentage of the Oaxacan state As of 2005, the municipality had a total population of 39,166.

event.title: rains a lot in the fall and at the beginning of the winter

data.event: The two rivers that crosses Loma Bonita are the Papaloapam and the Obispo river.The weather is mainly warm, although it rains a lot in the fall and at the beginning of the winter.
